metadata.title: Modeling the Transmission of Middle East Respirator Syndrome Corona virus in Republic of Korea

abstract.original_text: A. The basic reproduction number R 0 of system (1)

sentences.segment_text: The basic reproduction number R 0 of system ( 1 )

abstract.original_text: Through simple calculation, we can obtain a disease free equilibrium E 1 = (S 1 , 0, 0, 0, 0, R 1 ). Then we use the spectral radius of the next generation matrix (the method proposed by the Van Den Driessche in [1]) to get the expression of R 0 of system (1) . Firstly, only the infected compartments satisfied by the following system are considered:

Then we use the spectral radius of the next generation matrix ( the method proposed by the Van Den Driessche in ( 1 ) ) to get the expression of R 0 of system ( 1 ) .

abstract.original_text: where F denotes the rate of appearance of new infection and V denotes the rate of transfer of individuals.
